body:
Kit,

DeltaTemperature is now a part of Honeybee:

[https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/honeybee/commit/89d0b94c338f395...](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/honeybee/commit/89d0b94c338f3959360079de552cd20cd230245d)

See attached for a file that shuts off natural ventilation any time the outdoor temperature gets above the indoor temperature.

-Chris
